translations: 有意识地，清楚地；有意地，故意地

sentences.sentence: Part of me was very frightened and I consciously had to get a grip on myself.
sentences.translation: 我其实非常害怕，但又不得不有意识地控制住自己。

sentences.sentence: A previous study noted that dolphins always consciously control their breathing.
sentences.translation: 先前的一项研究指出，海豚总是有意识地控制自己的呼吸。

sentences.sentence: She was self-consciously aware of his stare.
sentences.translation: 她意识到他在看她，感到不自在。
